meanings.definition: A print made by a process involving an image transferred from an engraved plate to a sheet of paper.
meanings.sent1: The oleograph displayed a beautiful scene of nature.
meanings.sent2: I bought an oleograph of a famous painting for my living room.
meanings.sent3: The oleograph of the cat wearing sunglasses made me smile.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like an oleograph, perfectly captured in that moment.
meanings.sent5: The oleograph of the sunset was so vivid, it felt like I could touch the sky.

meanings.definition: To produce or reproduce an image using the oleograph process.
meanings.sent1: She learned how to oleograph pictures in her art class.
meanings.sent2: The artist decided to oleograph the landscape to create multiple copies.
meanings.sent3: I will oleograph this photo to make it look vintage.
meanings.sent4: His words oleograph memories in my mind, never to be forgotten.
meanings.sent5: The photographer oleographs moments of pure joy, freezing them in time.
